## DefaultGraph.remove() method

Remove a node by ID from the graph

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
remove(removeId: NodeId): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  removeId | [NodeId](./workflow.nodeid.md) | The node ID to remove |
